thread.title: Brooklyn Beckham only realised his parents David and Victoria were famous four years ago
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Beckham only realised his parents David and Victoria were famous four years ago

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Brooklyn Beckham only realised his parents David and Victoria were famous four years ago
text:
Brooklyn Beckham only realised his parents David and Victoria were famous four years ago The oldest son of David and Victoria had no idea his mum and dad were celebrity royalty Share Brooklyn Beckham didn't know his parents were famous (Photo: Wonderland)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Brooklyn Beckham was oblivious to his parents' fame for most of his life - and only found out his dad was a celebrity when David got mobbed by fans. 
The oldest Beckham boy, 17, has admitted he didn’t realise dad David and mum Victoria were hugely famous until he hit his teens. 
“I didn’t actually know that they were big until I was about 13,” he tells Wonderland magazine . 
“I went to a football game and people were shouting my dad’s name and I was like, ‘What?! Oh my God.’ I don’t look at them like that.” Brooklyn Beckham on the cover of Wonderland SPring 2017 (Photo: Wonderland) Brooklyn with his famous parents and siblings Cruz and Romeo before Harper came on the scene (Photo: Getty) Brooklyn says he didn't know they were famous until he was in his teens (Photo: Rex) 
Brooklyn is the cover star of Wonderland’s Spring 2017 issue, looking stylish and brooding in a Burberry breton top and jeans with his headphones in. 
Other shots in the magazine see Brooklyn giving a peace sign to camera in a Gucci t-shirt, navy trousers and loafers, with another of him in a denim jacket and jeans. 
Brooklyn was promoting his photography book What I See, which is released in March. 
“It’s pretty exciting to put my work out there and show people that I’m not just doing it because of who my parents are,” he explained. Brooklyn fell off his snowboard this week on a family holiday in Canada (Photo: WireImage) David and Brooklyn together playing some football (Photo: Getty) 
Earlier this week Brooklyn broke his collarbone after taking a nasty fall during a family snowboarding trip. 
He shared a video from his time on the slopes as she glided down the snowy hill, smoothly moving in and out of various obstacles. 
However, the clip came to a sudden stop when he took a tumble towards the end, falling to the ground as the camera following him seemed to get dropped. 
"Broke my collarbone at the end," he revealed, while he also shared his x-ray with fans on Instagram. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
